column9: I would say make the pricing more evident, took me a bit to find the credits section.
I did not understand the credit system.
Include the macros in the 'Your Meal Plan' section. Maybe even showing the split of the meals. Is there a way to log what food I eat or is it assuming I finish everything I order.

Buttons to go back, so it’s easier, for example when setting the meal credits and trying to go back to the profile. Also the meals make it seem like they’re clickable so I was confused when they weren’t

column2: choose a goal or press the plan button at the bottom
column3: On the bottom at the left there is a progress button
column9: Probably have a back button from pages you click such as preferences. To be able to see different meals for each day. To be able to input the actual calories i had eaten today. and kind of see if i hit a monthly/ weekly target maybe?
